name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CRE Data Exporter: Commercial Real Estate

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export unlimited commercial real estate data from Crexi.com. Ideal for investors, agents, brokers, buyers, sellers, data analysts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension that automates extracting commercial real estate property data from Crexi.com and bypasses the 1,000 CSV export limit on the website. It is perfect for investors, agents, brokers, buyers, sellers, data analysts and more.

It's a very simple extension that is easy to use and gets the job done with no need for coding or technical knowledge.


🧪Core Features:
    ✔️Scrape and extract any number of listings from supported websites:
           - Crexi.com
    ✔️Export data into a formatted CSV file or Google Sheets including:
           - Listing ID
           - Price
           - Name
           - Brokerage
           - Latitude and longitude
           - Address
           - Description
           - Market status
           - Listing URL
    ✔️No coding or technical knowledge needed. It's super easy to use!



🔒Permissions:
We understand there may be questions regarding the permissions needed to use the extension. We aim to be as transparent as possible hoping to inform you that we have absolutely no intent of using the access you grant to your browser maliciously. Follow the link below to read on:

https://tidisventures.com/privacy-policy?policy=cre-data-exporter-chrome-ext-privacy-policy


⭐ How To Use:
The extension popup has 3 buttons that control the entire functionality of the app. Each button is to get data from the webpage, clear the data to extract from scratch, and export the CSV file or save to Google Sheets respectively. To extract data, follow these steps:

   1. Go to Crexi.com/properties and search for a location. You can filter by price and the extension will account for those ranges.
   2. Open up the extension and click "Get data".
   3. Click "Export Data" when you're ready to download the data to CSV or Google Sheet.
   Optional: Change the settings to set the automation to your liking

For more info, please see the YouTube video above to learn how to use the extension. If there are any questions or other issues, please contact tidisventures@gmail.com.

Also, check the https://tidisventures.com/extensions/cre-data-exporter or the support page: https://tidisventures.com/support?app=cre-data-exporter


🏷️Pricing:
Upon installation of the extension, the user will be able to use the free version of the extension indefinitely. This limits the extension to export 2,000 data points per download (downloadable CSV file is available with the basic version). Upgrade to the premium version to enjoy exporting up to 25,000 listings at one time and other awesome features.


📚Terms and Conditions:
By using this extension, you agree to the terms here: https://tidisventures.com/terms-and-conditions?app=cre-data-exporter-terms, https://tidisventures.com/terms

💰Affiliate Program:
Join our affiliate program here: https://tidisventures.com/affiliate/program

✋Important:
Read more about the extension and its usage here: https://tidisventures.com/extensions/cre-data-exporter
